string-array.name: attributes_methods_description
string-array.item: Get long attribute value. Default is 0.
This is a read only value. Will always return 3.14
Get HelloWorldAttributes.ExampleStruct attribute value. \nDefault is NaN
Please enter a double value for HelloWorldAttributes.ExampleStruct attribute

string-array.name: builtin_methods_description
string-array.item: Returns the input 8 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input unsigned 8 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input 16 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input unsigned 16 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input 32 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input unsigned 32 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input 64 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input unsigned 64 bit int increased by 1
Returns the inverted value of the input boolean
Returns a float, half of the input value
Returns a double, two times the value of the input
Returns the given string (encoded as a sequence of bytes) in inverted order

Returns a double equal to: inputFloat * (0.01 * inputInteger)

Parameters must be passed as "inputFloat,inputInteger" in the text field below.

Example: 3.0,1

string-array.name: plain_old_data_methods_description
array_methods_description
string-array.item: Returns given String array in reversed order.
Returns given Int64 array in reversed order.
Returns given UInt32 array in reversed order.\nArrays are defined inline in FIDL file.
Returns given array of Int64 arrays in reversed order.\nArrays are created by adding 10¹, 10² and 10³ to input element.

string-array.name: inheritance_methods_description
string-array.item: Do a cross inheritance check for each variable against interfaces:\n Shape, Circle, Rectangle and Square.

Returns static logger content after executing:
 List <Shape> shapes =
 Arrays.asList(
 javaImplCircle,
 nativeImplCircle,
 nativeImplRectangle,
 parentJavaImplRectangle,
 childJavaImplRectangle,
 nativeImplSquare);
 
 InheritanceHelper.applyScaleOn(2.0, shapes);
